caption: A heartfelt singer-songwriter track with warm acoustic guitar, subtle piano, and honest male vocals. The stripped-back production lets the storytelling shine through with gentle string swells in the chorus.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
I wrote this song at 2 AM
Thinking about where I've been
All the roads that led me here
All the love and all the fear

[Verse 2]
My father's hands were rough and worn
Worked the fields since he was born
Taught me how to be a man
Did the best that he can

[Chorus]
These are the stories of my life
The joy the pain the sacrifice
Every chapter made me whole
These stories shaped my soul

[Verse 3]
First love broke my heart in two
Thought I'd never make it through
But time has got a way to heal
Teaching us what's truly real

[Chorus]
These are the stories of my life
The joy the pain the sacrifice
Every chapter made me whole
These stories shaped my soul

[Bridge]
And when my time has come to go
I hope these songs let people know

[Outro]
These stories shaped my soul
